SELECT F.FLOW_ID flowId, M.MERCHANT_ID as merchantId, M.MERCHANT_NAME as merchantName, M.MERCHANT_TYPE as merchantType, M.GRANT_AREA as grantArea, A.BALANCE as balance, F.TRADE_VALUE tradeVlue, A.BANK_HOST_NAME bankHostName, A.BANK_CARD_ID bankCardId, F.UPDATE_TIME updateTime, F.STATUS as status FROM t_account_flow F LEFT JOIN t_account A ON F.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN t_merchant_manage M ON F.PERSON_ID = M.MERCHANT_ID
F.PERSON_ID IN (SELECT MERCHANT_ID FROM t_merchant_manage)
AND F.STATUS = #{status}
AND M.MERCHANT_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{merchantName},'%')

SELECT F.FLOW_ID flowId, M.USER_ID as userId, M.USER_NAME as userName, M.TELEPHONE as telephone, M.WECHAT_NUM as wechatNum, A.BALANCE as balance, F.TRADE_VALUE tradeVlue, A.BANK_HOST_NAME bankHostName, A.BANK_CARD_ID bankCardId, F.UPDATE_TIME updateTime, F.STATUS as status FROM t_account_flow F LEFT JOIN t_account A ON F.PERSON_ID = A.PERSON_ID LEFT JOIN t_member_basicinfo M ON F.PERSON_ID = M.USER_ID
F.PERSON_ID IN (SELECT USER_ID FROM t_member_basicinfo)
F.STATUS = #{status}
and M.USER_NAME like CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%')

UPDATE t_account SET UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime},SETTLE_APPLYING = SETTLE_APPLYING - (SELECT TRADE_VALUE FROM t_account_flow WHERE FLOW_ID = #{flowId}) WHERE PERSON_ID = (SELECT PERSON_ID FROM t_account_flow WHERE FLOW_ID = #{flowId})
